name: 2022 2nd International Workshop on Information Management
content: Publication: All submitted papers will be sent to 2-3 peer reviewers for reviewing. After a careful reviewing process, as the workshop of AEIS 2022, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published into the AEIS 2022 conference proceedings as the special chapter, and submitted for Ei Compendex and Scopus Index, etc.
